Article.ArticleTitle: Advancing preclinical cancer models to assess clinically relevant outcomes.

AbstractText: Cancer models are indispensable research tools for elucidating the mechanisms involved in tumor onset, progression and treatment resistance. They are key in evaluating therapeutics prior clinical trials. In this editorial, we invite contributions for a BMC Cancer's Collection of articles addressing 'Advances in pre-clinical cancer models' towards relivable outcomes at the preclinical stage.

The Alvin J. Siteman Comprehensive Cancer Ceter, Department of Surgery, Washington University School of Medicine in St. Louis, St. Louis, USA.

CoiStatement: AG and RCF act as guest editors in the BMC Cancer collection: ’Advances in pre-clinical cancer models’’.
